name: dester
description: A simple CLI js/ts lib-builder that uses Rollup, Babel and TypeScript/Sucrase
author: cftcview <cftcview@gmail.com>

scripts.pkg:name: cat package.json | grep '"name":' | cut -d '"' -f4
scripts.git:commit: git add . && read -p 'Commit: ' c; c=${c:-v$(npm run -s pkg:version)} && n=$(npm run -s pkg:name) && git commit -m "$n: $c"
scripts.commit: read -p 'Version [patch]: ' V; V=${V:-patch} && npm version --force --no-git-tag-version $V; echo $V && read -p 'Push? (y/N): ' G && read -p 'Publish? (y/N): ' P && npm run -s git:commit && case $G in Y|y) $(git push);; esac && case $P in Y|y) $(npm run -s git:set:tag && git push --tags && npm -s publish);; esac
